title: Penny Mordaunt – 2023 Speech to the Institute for Government Annual Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Penny Mordaunt, the Leader of the House of Commons, to the Institute for Government annual conference held on 17 January 2023.
content:
Good afternoon, everyone and thank you for inviting me along today.
